document_data.name: Glittering Spires
document_data.mainbody: The '''Glittering Spires''' was a small mountain range found in the northern reaches of the [[Hordelands]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Geography:
[[File:[[File:Glittering Spires atlas .png|thumb|''A map showing the Glittering Spires within the Hordelands.'']]
The Glittering Spires bordered [[Yal Tengri]], shielding much of the [[Plain of Horses]] to the east from the frigid breeze of the sea. The mountain range was enclosed by the [[Winterflow River]] to the south and terminated near the mouth of the [[Arundi River]] in the north.
